mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, password, name, tel, birthday, nicname, place, gender, taste, coupleId) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, TO_DATE(#{birthday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{nicname}, #{place}, #{gender}, #{taste}, null)
mapper.select: SELECT email, password, name, tel, birthday, nicname, place, gender, taste, coupleId FROM MEMBER
